name: comfygame Pre-Pre-Alpha v-0.1
description:
this is super ultra embarrassingly early but hey why not, it'll be fun seeing how much progress i make next time around

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button - Interact with things

Tab - Open/close inventory (to close it again after clicking on something right click somewhere that isn't an inventory item)

G - Drop/unequip held item

Shift - Sprint

I - don't press this button or you'll have to close and open the game again
